InvalidMatchesException - Exception Class in it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
class InvalidMatchesException is thrown if the number of matches between the item position in the player shelf and in the template grid of the personal object card is more than 6.

InvalidNumberOfPlayersException - Exception Class in it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions

InvalidSelectionException - Exception Class in it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
Class InvalidSelectionException is thrown when the Items drawn by the player: -are not in the same column or in the same row on the game board; -are not one after the other on the game board; -have not almost a free side on the game board.
InvalidSelectionException(String) - Constructor for exception class it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions.InvalidSelectionException
Constructor for InvalidSelectionException class with the specific message of the error.
